message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,500,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1,400,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't accept anything below $1,450,000. This product holds significant value, and I'm confident it will benefit you greatly.
Thank you for your response, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $1,425,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
